amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for the Lobster Institute at the University of Maine in Orono, Maine.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $200,000 appropriation in the bill for the Lobster Institute at the University of Maine in Orono, Maine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 328 (Roll no. 735).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
